.. include:: /properties.rst

 
Targets for snoRNAs
===================

Putative modification sites in RNAs of *Cryptococcus*, compared to those in RNAs of bakers's yeast or human [#snopy]_, are annotated below. Nucleotides not described as modified in other organisms are indicated as :raw-html:`<span class="mononorm"><a id="N" title="Only in Cryptococcus" class="cneo">N</a>`.

:raw-html:`<table><tr><th><i>Saccharomyces cerevisiae</i></th><th>&nbsp;</th><th><i>Cryptococcus deneoformans</i></th></tr>`

.. rst-class:: mononote

:raw-html:`<tr><th colwith="3">ETS1 pre-rRNA</tr><tr><td>`
